attribute.name: src
attribute.description: The URI to which the data elements should be returned. If it is absent, the data is returned to the the state machine's caller. The state machine's caller is the external state machine that invoked it with the <invoke> tag, or, failing that, the state machine's environment.

attribute.name: namelist
attribute.type: whitespace separated list of locations in the datamodel
attribute.validValues: Any list of locations in the datamodel, where each location is a well-formed path expression.
attribute.description: The data will be returned to the <src> as path followed by the xml tree located at the path. Default scoping rules apply. If no namelist is present, the returned value defaults to be the contents of the closest <datamodel> element (following the standard lexical scoping rules.)
